email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Milwaukee
email_response.body:
Hello!

Thank you for reaching out about the satellite project. I'm interested!

I have the following equipment ready:
- Bucket truck (International with 48ft aerial lift)
- Spectrum analyzer (Keysight FieldFox)
- OTDR (Viavi MTS-2000)

I'm BICSI certified and CompTIA Network+ certified. I've been doing this type of work for 8 years with an excellent track record.

I can travel anywhere in Wisconsin and the upper Midwest. Very flexible with scheduling.

Looking forward to hearing more details!

Rachel Green
Wisconsin Tech Services
(414) 555-0876
